resources.string: Sophisticated establishment featuring refined New Canadian cuisine in a low-lit, romantic setting.
Polished outfit for locally sourced, globally inspired dishes amid stone accents and communal tables.

The Canadian Museum of History, formerly the Canadian Museum of Civilization, is Canadas national museum of human history. It is located in the Hull area of Gatineau, Quebec, directly across the Ottawa River from Parliament Hill in Ottawa, Ontario.
Parliament Hill, colloquially known as The Hill, is an area of Crown land on the southern banks of the Ottawa River in downtown Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

The Rideau Centre is a four-level shopping centre on Rideau Street in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. It borders on Rideau Street, the ByWard Market, the Rideau Canal, the Mackenzie King Bridge, and Nicholas Street in Downtown Ottawa.
